notes:
Is the boss of Warlord Level, Pit #8.
[[Deathbringer|Next #9.]]
sounds: You are no match for a master of the Mooh'Tah!
I might be fallen but you will fall before me!
I still know the ways of the Moo'Tah.
usedelements: Physical Damage, Life Drain, Earth Damage, Fire Damage
name: Fallen Mooh'Tah Master Ghar
strategy:
To all [[vocations]]: stay diagonal, watch out when doing attacks like [[Fierce Berserk]] or [[Ethereal Spear]], because you may get exhausted and be unable to heal. So keep your [[health]] full before using these types of attacks.
[[Mage]]: Use [[Magic Shield]] and [[Sudden Death]] runes.
[[Knight]]: Melee and [[Fierce Berserk]].
[[Paladin]]: Shoot [[Assassin Stars]] and use [[Ethereal Spear]].
See also [[Mooh'Tah]].
